text: Ūst, ki şumoro dar xuşkī va dar darjo sajr medihad. To on goh ki dar kiştiho hastand va ʙodi muvofiq ʙa harakataşon meovarad, şodmonand. Cun tūfon faro rasad va mavç az har sū ʙar onho rezad, cunon pindorand, ki dar muhosirai mavç qaror giriftaand, (jaqin mekunand, ki halok meşavand), Allohro az rūi ixlos va jagonagī ʙixonand, ki agar moro az in xatar ʙirahonī, hatman, az şukrguzoron xohem ʙud
